abstract: BHP Billiton of Australia said that weakness in the American housing market showed no sign of reducing demand for commodities in Asia and Europe.
snippet: BHP Billiton of Australia said that weakness in the American housing market showed no sign of reducing demand for commodities in Asia and Europe.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton of Australia, the world’s largest mining company, reported an eighth consecutive record profit yesterday and said that weakness in the American housing market showed no sign of reducing demand for commodities in Asia and Europe.

headline.main: Record Profit at Australian Mining Giant
headline.print_headline: Record Profit at Australian Mining Giant
